TextEng: "I'm done with you. Time to die."
"Okay, I'll let you live if you answer my questions."
"What can you tell me about Undermountain?"
"Funny. You look like a flesh golem to me."
"I want to ask you something else."
"Creating something as annoying as you proves Halaster was insane."
Text: "너같이 짜증나는 걸 만든 걸 보면 할라스터가 미쳤다는 증거네."

TextEng: "Do you have a plan to free him?"
"What's in this for me if I help you?"
"Don't worry - I'll find a way to free Halaster."
"Why would I save someone as insane as Halaster?"
Text: "할라스터처럼 미친 사람을 왜 내가 구해줘야 해?"

TextEng: "I want to ask you some questions."
